properties.value: Efaritay's aid is a topaz ring enchanted via the Lvl-3 Enchant spell. When worn, the player will be able to harm vampyric creatures who are vulnerable to only silver weaponry with any weapon; however, the most damage a player can deal in one hit is capped at 10. The ring will provide 200 charges before disappearing, consuming one charge per attack, regardless of whether it was a successful hit. Ring charges will not be consumed when attacking a Vampyre Juvinate with silver bolts.

Item ID21140

Efaritay's aid is a topaz ring enchanted via the Lvl-3 Enchant spell. When worn, the player will be able to harm vampyric creatures who are vulnerable to only silver weaponry with any weapon; however, the most damage a player can deal in one hit is capped at 10. The ring will provide 200 charges before disappearing, consuming one charge per attack, regardless of whether it was a successful hit. Ring charges will not be consumed when attacking a Vampyre Juvinate with silver bolts.

The ring does not work against Vyrewatch.
